predicate.note: Frames file for 'launch' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'introduce'

roleset.name: introduce, bring up, start

example.name: transitive
example.text: DD Acquisition has launched a suit in a Delaware court seeking the withdrawal of Dunkin's poison pill rights and employee stock ownership plans.
example.arg: seeking the withdrawal of Dunkin's poison pill rights and employee stock ownership plans

example.name: frequently passivized
example.text: For example, stock-index futures began trading in Chicago in 1982, and within two years they were the fastest-growing futures contract ever launched *trace*.

example.name: might split up a constituent
example.text: Separately, the Ontario Supreme Court said it will postpone indefinitely a ruling on the lawsuit launched *trace* by the University of Toronto against Connaught in connection with the Merieux bid.
example.arg: in connection with the Merieux bid

roleset.note: In the last examples it's actually "the lawsuit against Connaught" as Arg1, but call the "against Connaught" an unextended ArgM to show that it modifies another arg.
